attributes.action: accept the request of President Bharrat Jagdeo of Guyana to place the Guyana rainforest under UK management in order to protect it.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: President Jagdeo proposed to the UK government in November 2007 that the UK manage Guyana's unexpoited rainforests. Guyana cannot afford to do this. The proposal would allow Guyana to develop economically without destroying the rainforest, while its preservation would significantly offset UK carbon emissions.
